Package pl.polsl.zagorski.model

package pl.polsl.zagorski.model
  • Class
    Description
    DerativeCalculator
     
    DerativeCoefficientCalc
    A defined interface is needed for using a lambda expression.
    Derivative
    The Derivative class contains a method for calculating the derivative coefficients and correctly formatting the response.
    MyException
    A custom exception needed to convey information to the user about an error that occurred.
    Polynomial
    The Polynomial class represents a polynomial and has an argument "coefficients" that contains its coefficients.
